# cmccloudv2_autoscaling_group (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# get as group by id
data "autoscaling_group" "example" {
  autoscaling_group_id    = "your_vpc_id" 
}

# get as group by name
data "autoscaling_group" "example" {
  name    = "as-group-xk8a" 
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `autoscaling_group_id` (String) Id of the autoscaling group
- `configuration_id` (String) Configuration id of the autoscaling group, exact match
- `configuration_name` (String) Configuration name of the autoscaling group, exact match
- `name` (String) Name of the autoscaling group, exact match
- `status` (String)

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
